com.tigertext.ttandroid.org

Class OrganizationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tigertext.ttandroid.org.OrganizationManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TTPubSub.Listener

    public class OrganizationManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements TTPubSub.Listener
    Manages interactions with user organizations.

      void initOrganizationsManager()

      java.util.List<Organization> updateOrgManagerAndDBSync()
      The following actions are taken in this method:
      - Fetch organizations from server
      - Update the database with the fetched data(add or remove orgs)
      - Update the manager info
      - Notify with pubsub events about changes in orgs

      Note: This method blocks the calling thread

      • joinOrganizations

        public void joinOrganizations(java.util.List<java.lang.String> emailList)
        Join multiple organizations

        Caller is responsible for subscribing to TTPubSub with TTEVENT.ORGS_JOINED event.

        No response will be given if join organization fails.

      • joinOrganization

        public void joinOrganization(@NonNull
                             java.lang.String emailId,
                             @Nullable
                             GenericAPICallStatusListener listener)
        Join an organization. The listener call backs return on the Main thread.

      • updateOrgManagerAndDBSync

        @WorkerThread
public java.util.List<Organization> updateOrgManagerAndDBSync()
                                                                     throws TTException
        The following actions are taken in this method:
        - Fetch organizations from server
        - Update the database with the fetched data(add or remove orgs)
        - Update the manager info
        - Notify with pubsub events about changes in orgs

        Note: This method blocks the calling thread
        Throws:
        TTException
        See Also:
        TTPubSub.addListener(String, TTPubSub.Listener), TTEvent.ORGS_UPDATED

      • updateOrganizations

        @WorkerThread
public boolean updateOrganizations()


        Note: This method blocks the calling thread
        See Also:
        updateOrgManagerAndDBSync()

      • modifyOrganizationSettings

        public void modifyOrganizationSettings(@NonNull
                                       java.lang.String orgId,
                                       @NonNull
                                       java.util.Map<SettingType,java.lang.Object> modifiedSettings,
                                       @Nullable
                                       GenericAPICallStatusListener listener)
        Modifies a subset of organization settings from OrganizationSettings.ORGANIZATION_SETTINGS for the selected org
        Parameters:
        orgId - The id of the organization whose setings should be updated
        modifiedSettings - A Map containing SettingType settings to sync with the server and locally
        listener - An optional listener to be notified whether the call succeeds or fails

      • isInitialized

        public boolean isInitialized()
        Returns:
        true if OrganizationManager already loaded the organizations from the database, false otherwise

      • initOrganizationsManager

        public void initOrganizationsManager()
                              throws TTException
        Forces the organization manager initialization, this method is helpful in those places where you need to access the organization manager too close to the app initialization.
        Throws:
        TTException

        public static java.lang.String createSecureOrgPref(java.lang.String orgId)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Deprecated. Org settings are no longer stored in shared prefs. This is only used for upgrade
        Returns a ready to use shared pref name with a prefix value and an encrypted orgId
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
